| HistoryText             = [[Arcade (Earth-616)|Arcade]] was hired by [[Carl Kerridge (Earth-616)|Carl Kerridge]] to torture [[Jean-Paul Beaubier (Earth-616)|Northstar]] and drive him to the point of exhaustion. Arcade had a variety of traps and attacks laid out for Northstar around the globe, each with a clue leading to the next trap.

The final trap was in [[New Orleans]] where a band of mercenaries awaited him.  The weakened Northstar was defeated and they moved in for the kill.  The intervention of [[Heather Hudson (Earth-616)|Guardian]] saved Northstar.  The employees of Arcade were taken into custody by [[Tigerstryke]].
